definition: to take a wrong step in life (idiom)/to go astray
mistake/error/to miss/to harm/to delay/to neglect/mistakenly
to enter/to go into/to join/to become a member of/to confirm or agree with/abbr. for 入聲|入声[ru4 sheng1]
divergent/side road
way/route/road
garden path effect
pinyin: wu4 ru4 qi2 tu2 xiao4 ying4

sentences.english: Desire. It's an emotion designed to lead us astray.
sentences.chinese: 欲望，是诱惑我们误入歧途的情感。

sentences.english: She went to Paris to bring back her errant son.
sentences.chinese: 她到巴黎去把误入歧途的儿子领回来。

sentences.english: But halos also can lead investors astray.
sentences.chinese: 然而，光环也能让投资者误入歧途。

sentences.english: She was a woman ganging a wee bit gleed in her walk through the world.
sentences.chinese: 她是一个在世间误入歧途的女子。

sentences.english: To attribute the rise and fall of the economy to their spending puts the relationship backward.
sentences.chinese: 经济学家误入歧途将经济的升降同开支扯上关系。

sentences.english: I used notes lest faulty memory should lead me astray.
sentences.chinese: 我翻阅了所做的笔记，免得记错了而使我误入歧途。

sentences.english: His passion for horseracing carried him astray.
sentences.chinese: 他对赛马运动的酷爱使他误入歧途。

sentences.english: To put it bluntly: if we miss the poor, we miss the point.
sentences.chinese: 坦率地说，如果我们错过穷人，我们就会误入歧途。

sentences.english: Even the best model can be sidetracked by false premises.
sentences.chinese: 甚至最好的模型，也会因为错误的前提而误入歧途。

definition: fork in a road/wrong road
see 邪道[xie2 dao4]
to get back on the right path/to mend one's ways
to diverge from the main road, also figuratively
to make a serious mistake (idiom)
to mend one's ways (idiom)/to turn over a new leaf
to repeat errors/to continue blundering/to make continuous mistakes
a single slip may cause everlasting sorrow (idiom)
pinyin: yi1 shi1 zu2 cheng2 qian1 gu3 hen4

definition: momentary slip/false step/ill-considered action
to lose one's way
to abandon oneself (idiom)/to let oneself go
lit. to rein in the horse at the edge of the precipice (idiom)/fig. to act in the nick of time
unpracticed/inexperienced/naive/unsophisticated
to take an indirect route/to waste one's time by using an inappropriate method
to have bad consequences
to follow bad examples/to be corrupted by bad examples
